Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.math

Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
ch.epfl.cs107.play.math.Shape
ch.epfl.cs107.play.math.Polygon
public final class Polygon extends Shape
Represents a polygon, without self-intersection.
